department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
short_summary: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development seeks a Senior Feminist Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Consultant.
description: Senior Feminist Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning Consultant for Women's Leadership and Voice Program
full_summary:
================
**Tender Notice**

**Application Title:** Women’s Voice and Leadership (WVL) Senior Feminist Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning (MEL) Consultant
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01009493
**Publication Date:** November 17, 2022

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has issued a call for proposals for the provision of Senior Feminist Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning (MEL) Consultant services. The selected consultant will be responsible for:

* Coordinating and consolidating the feminist learning component of the WVL MEL work plan
* Facilitating sense-making exercises and consultations for the next cycle of Women’s Right Organizations programming
* Producing initial learning and strategic programming orientation

**Eligibility Criteria:** [Only TSPS Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60ZT-18TSPS/XXX/ZT Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following Stream: Stream 2: Business Consulting / Change Management]

**Required Qualifications:** [One (1) X 2.12 Evaluation Services Consultant – Senior]

**Scope of Work:**

* The senior feminist MEL consultant will be responsible for the coordination and consolidation of the feminist learning component of the WVL MEL work plan.
* The consultant will facilitate sense-making exercises and consultations for the next cycle of Women’s Right Organizations programming.
* The consultant will produce initial learning and strategic programming orientation.

**Tender Process:**

* Participation in this tender is restricted to TSPS Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60ZT-18TSPS/XXX/ZT Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following Stream: Stream 2: Business Consulting / Change Management.
* Tender submissions must include all necessary documentation, including the required qualifications.
* Proposals must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on December 14, 2022.

**Contact Information:**

* Claudine Morin, 
* email: claudine.morin@international.gc.ca
* Address: 200 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC J8X 4B7, Canada

**For More Information:**
* Visit the Canada Budes website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/17/93a12084d8934196e0aeb916055eb125/
